item.title: 标准普尔 500 指数、道指期货在华特迪士尼业绩公布前走高
item.description: 周二，在华特迪士尼公布季度业绩之前，跟踪标普 500 指数和道琼斯指数的期货走高，而美联储今年降息的预期也有助于支撑市场情绪。【原文：Futures tracking the S&P 500 and Dow edged higher on Tuesday, ahead of quarterly results from Walt Disney, while expectations of the Federal Reserve's interest rate cuts this year helped support market sentiments.】

item.title: 随着订单增长，中国商飞将扩建上海 C919 飞机工厂
item.description: 据项目承包商之一称，中国商飞公司正在上海扩建国产 C919 喷气式飞机的生产设施，这家国有飞机制造商正在加紧生产，以完成数百份新订单。【原文：China's COMAC is expanding production facilities for its homegrown C919 jets in Shanghai, according to one of the project contractors, as the state-owned planemaker ramps up manufacturing to fulfill hundreds of new orders.】

item.title: 普拉达继承人称集团一直在寻找并购机会
item.description: 意大利奢侈品集团普拉达（Prada）创始人之子洛伦佐-贝尔泰利（Lorenzo Bertelli）周二表示，普拉达一直在寻找收购机会。【原文：Italian luxury group Prada is always looking out for acquisition opportunities, Lorenzo Bertelli, son of the group's founders, said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 报告称，随着交易回归，今年华尔街奖金将增加
item.description: 金融服务薪酬公司 Johnson Associates 的数据显示，在股市强劲上涨和投资银行业复苏的推动下，华尔街今年的奖金有望恢复。【原文：Bonuses are poised to recover on Wall Street this year, fueled by strong equity market gains and recovery in investment banking, according to financial services compensation firm Johnson Associates.】

item.title: 美国降息希望破灭，交易商关注全股票交易
item.description: 由于市场降低了对美国今年降息的预期，美国最大的企业准备更多地依靠股票和庞大的现金储备，而不是昂贵的债务来为收购融资。【原文：As markets dial down expectations for U.S. interest rate cuts this year, America's largest corporations are poised to rely more heavily on their stock and a bulging cash hoard instead of expensive debt to finance acquisitions.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美国降温消除市场焦虑，瑞银跳涨
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 对 Archegos 公司老板 Bill Hwang 的审判将检验不寻常的操纵理论
item.description: 黄成国（Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang）的律师预计将在本月于纽约对前 Archegos 资本管理公司老板黄成国进行的刑事审判中辩称，检察官正在推行一种新颖而无稽的市场操纵理论。【原文：Attorneys for Sung Kook “Bill” Hwang are expected to argue that prosecutors are pushing a novel and nonsensical market manipulation theory when the criminal trial of the former Archegos Capital Management boss kicks off in New York this month.】

item.title: 独家报道：巴拉圭竞标价值 15 亿美元的阿根廷-巴西天然气连接管道
item.description: 巴拉圭和巴西的高级政府官员告诉路透社记者，巴拉圭正在推进与阿根廷和巴西的能源公司和高级政府官员的会谈，商讨可能耗资 15 亿美元修建一条连接三国的天然气管道。【原文：Paraguay is advancing talks with energy firms and high-ranking government officials from Argentina and Brazil over a potential $1.5 billion gas pipeline to connect the three countries, senior government officials for Paraguay and Brazil told Reuters.】

item.title: 英国股票最大所有者警告伦敦证券交易所不要削弱上市规则
item.description: 路透社看到的一封写给伦敦证券交易所主席的信显示，英国股票最大的集体所有者警告伦敦证券交易所不要削弱其上市规则和治理标准，以帮助吸引新的业务。【原文：The biggest collective owners of UK shares have warned the London Stock Exchange against weakening its listing rules and governance standards to help attract fresh business, a letter to its chair seen by Reuters showed.】

item.title: 美国要求特斯拉就自动驾驶汽车召回调查作出答复
item.description: 美国汽车安全调查人员正在要求特斯拉提供详细的答案和文件，以调查该汽车制造商在 12 月召回 200 多万辆汽车以安装新的自动驾驶保护装置一事。【原文：U.S. auto safety investigators are seeking detailed answers and documents from Tesla in an investigation into the automaker's December recall of more than 2 million vehicles to install new Autopilot safeguards.】

item.title: 瑞银集团首席执行官称瑞士将于 2024 年底开始裁员
item.description: 瑞银集团首席执行官周二表示，瑞士本土市场的大部分裁员将从今年年底左右开始，并持续到2025年和2026年。【原文：UBS's CEO on Tuesday said the majority of job cuts in its home market, Switzerland, will start from around the end of the year and continue into 2025 and 2026.】

item.title: 据《非洲金融报》报道，Perpetual 将解体，其名称将在近 10 亿美元的交易中出售给 KKR
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》周二报道，澳大利亚 Perpetual 公司将被拆分，其名称将出售给全球投资公司 KKR & Co，交易价值超过 15 亿澳元（9.9 亿美元）。【原文：Australia's Perpetual will be broken up, with its name sold to global investment firm KKR & Co , in a deal worth over A$1.5 billion ($990 million), the Australian Financial Review reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉中国制造电动汽车 4 月销量同比下降 18
item.description: 中国乘用车联席会（CPCA）周二公布的数据显示，美国汽车制造商特斯拉四月份在中国销售了62167辆电动汽车，同比下降18%。【原文：U.S. automaker Tesla sold 62,167 China-made electric vehicles in April, down 18% from a year earlier, the China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 菲律宾 PLDT 商谈向日本 NTT 出售最多 49% 的数据中心业务
item.description: 菲律宾最大的电信集团 PLDT 董事长曼努埃尔-潘吉里南（Manuel Pangilinan）周二告诉路透社，PLDT 正在与日本电信电话公司（NTT）谈判出售其数据中心业务最多 49% 的股份。【原文：The Philippines' largest telecommunications group PLDT is in talks to sell up to 49% of its data centre business to Japan's Nippon Telegraph and Telephone (NTT) , PLDT Chairman Manuel Pangilinan told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，中国中金公司今年可能削减至少 10%的投资银行业务人数
item.description: 中国国际金融有限公司（中金公司）的两位知情人士称，由于资本市场低迷和经济不景气，中金公司今年可能将投资银行业务的员工人数减少至少 10%。【原文：China International Capital Corp (CICC) may reduce its investment banking headcount by at least 10% this year, two people with knowledge of the matter said, as a capital market downturn and sluggish economy darken prospects.】

item.title: 消息人士称，必和必拓坚持认为英美资源集团的南非资产必须在任何收购中退出
item.description: 了解必和必拓想法的投资者说，必和必拓计划剥离其目标公司英美资源集团（Anglo American）的南非资产，这是拟议收购背后战略的关键，预计将成为任何修订报价的一部分。【原文：BHP's plan to divest the South African assets of its target Anglo American are key to the strategy behind the proposed takeover and is expected to be a part of any revised offer, investors briefed on the miner's thinking said.】

item.title: 独家报道微软遭西班牙初创企业投诉云计算做法
item.description: 本周二，一家西班牙初创企业集团向西班牙反垄断监管机构投诉微软的云计算做法，这是微软因其快速增长的云计算服务而受到的最新一次投诉，也是继一家贸易集团向欧盟投诉之后的又一次投诉。【原文：Microsoft was hit with a Spanish startup group's complaint about its cloud practices to the Spanish antitrust regulator on Tuesday, the latest grievance over its fast-growing cloud computing services and which followed a trade group's EU complaint.】

item.title: 空中客车公司四月份交付量增长 13
item.description: 欧洲飞机制造商空中客车公司周二表示，4月份交付了61架飞机，比2023年同期增长了13%，使今年迄今为止的交付量达到203架。【原文：Airbus delivered 61 aircraft in April, up 13% from the same month of 2023, bringing deliveries so far this year to 203, the European planemaker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 电动汽车炒作降温，丰田将从混合动力车中获得盈利提升
item.description: 丰田汽车周三公布的年度财报显示，混合动力汽车的需求有望大幅提升丰田汽车的业绩，这说明随着对电池电动汽车的炒作降温，这家全球销量最高的汽车制造商有望从中受益。【原文：Toyota Motor is expected to get a big lift from demand for hybrids when it reports annual earnings on Wednesday, illustrating how the world's top-selling automaker is poised to benefit as hype around battery electric vehicles cools.】

item.title: 任天堂预计今年将售出 1350 万台 Switch
item.description: 任天堂周二表示，预计在截至 2025 年 3 月的财年内将售出 1350 万台 Switch 游戏机。【原文：Nintendo said on Tuesday it expects to sell 13.5 million Switch consoles in the financial year ending March 2025.】

item.title: 尽管第一季度净收入减少，沙特阿美仍维持 310 亿美元的股息
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯国有石油巨头阿美石油公司（Aramco）预计将向沙特政府和股东支付 310 亿美元的红利，尽管该公司周二公布的第一季度财报显示，受油价和销售量下降的影响，盈利有所减少。【原文：Saudi Arabian state-owned oil giant Aramco expects to pay $31 billion in dividends to the Saudi government and its shareholders despite reporting lower earnings for the first quarter on Tuesday, hit by lower oil prices and volumes sold.】

item.title: 首席执行官表示，Primark 所有者将提高解释食品业务优点的能力
item.description: Primark 的所有者英国联合食品公司（Associated British Foods）首席执行官告诉路透社，该公司在向投资者解释其食品业务的战略逻辑、增长潜力和价值方面做得不够好，必须做得更好。【原文：Primark owner Associated British Foods has not done a good enough job of explaining to investors the strategic logic, growth potential and value of its food businesses and must do better, its chief executive told Reuters.】

item.title: 聚焦：欧洲首个 "实时 "股票交易磁带的竞争白热化
item.description: 银行和资产管理公司正与欧洲的交易所争相开发技术，以扩大欧洲大陆资本市场的投资者群体，更好地与华尔街竞争。【原文：Banks and asset managers are vying with Europe’s exchanges to develop technology that can deepen the pool of investors in the continent’s capital markets and better compete with Wall Street.】

item.title: 聚焦：意大利鞋履制造商 Tod's 向美国的静谧奢华爱好者抛出橄榄枝
item.description: 一家由路威酩轩集团（LVMH）支持的投资公司打赌，美国富人对低调奢华的需求将确保其在意大利鞋商 Tod's 所持的 5.1 亿欧元（5.45 亿美元）股份能获得私募股权通常寻求的两位数回报。【原文：An investment firm backed by LVMH is betting demand from wealthy Americans for quiet luxury will ensure its 510 million euro ($545 million) stake in Italian shoemaker Tod's yields the double-digit returns private equity typically seeks.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国 Zeekr 将提前一天完成 3.675 亿美元的纽约 IPO
item.description: 据两位直接知情的消息人士透露，中国电动汽车制造商紫光智能技术控股有限公司将于本周三完成纽约首次公开募股（IPO）的簿记建档工作，募集资金最多可达3.675亿美元。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Zeekr Intelligent Technology Holding will close its New York initial public offering (IPO) bookbuilding to raise up to $367.5 million on Wednesday, according to two sources with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，中国新奥转向竞争对手比亚迪，为新电动汽车品牌提供动力
item.description: 三位直接了解内情的消息人士称，中国电动汽车制造商尼奥已与规模更大的竞争对手比亚迪达成协议，为一个售价较低的电动汽车品牌采购电池，该品牌的目标是与特斯拉竞争。【原文：China electric vehicle maker Nio has struck a deal with larger rival BYD to source batteries for an EV brand priced at a lower range that aims to compete with Tesla , three sources with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行认为无需加息，但对物价风险保持警惕
item.description: 澳大利亚央行行长周二表示，利率已连续第六个月保持稳定，处于合适水平，但警告称通胀风险呈上升趋势，这表明政策不太可能很快放松。【原文：Australia's central bank chief said on Tuesday interest rates were at the right level after holding steady for a sixth month, but cautioned that inflation risks were on the upside in a sign policy was unlikely to be eased anytime soon.】

item.title: 瑞银集团报告自接管瑞士信贷以来首次盈利
item.description: 瑞银集团公布的 1 月至 3 月净收入为 18 亿美元，这是该集团接管已倒下的竞争对手瑞士信贷以来首次实现季度盈利。【原文：UBS reported net income of $1.8 billion for January-March, its first quarterly profit since it took over fallen rival Credit Suisse.】

item.title: 瑞银公布第一季度股东应占利润 17.6 亿美元
item.description: 瑞银集团周二公布，第一季度股东应占利润为 17.6 亿美元，比分析师在公司提供的民意调查中预测的 6.02 亿美元预期利润高出一倍多。【原文：UBS Group on Tuesday reported a profit of $1.76 billion attributable to shareholders in the first quarter, more than double the expected profit of $602 million forecast by analysts in a company-provided poll.】

item.title: 欧洲 降息；丰收的阴霾
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】
